coreAttributes.name: arcane sledgehammer
coreAttributes.description: A large, long-handled hammer, bearing the brand 'Dominion Steel'. Despite the name of its manufacturer, this particular tool's head is made out of ethereal arcane energy instead of steel, thereby granting it superior durability and the ability to be easily reforged.
coreAttributes.equipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(heft)] [npc.her] sledgehammer, ready to swing it at a moment's notice.

hitDescriptions.hitText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(swing)] [npc.her] sledgehammer at [npc2.name], grinning as the ethereal arcane head smacks into [npc2.her] body!
Lunging out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] sledgehammer, [npc.name] [npc.verb(grin)] as [npc.she] [npc.verb(see)] the ethereal arcane head connect with [npc2.her] body!
[npc.Name] [npc.verb(swing)] at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] sledgehammer, causing [npc2.herHim] to stagger back as the ethereal arcane head whacks into [npc2.her] chest!

missDescriptions.missText: Lunging out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] sledgehammer, [npc.name] [npc.verb(let)] out a frustrated cry as [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
With a quick step forwards, [npc.name] [npc.verb(swing)] at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] sledgehammer, but [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
